Question: At a press conference, this person faulted the then current campaign finance laws, rather then Udall.
Hints: In August 2009, his brother, Senator Edward M ****, was also buried near his two brothers.
In 1940 this person completed his thesis, "Appeasement in Munich", about British participation in the Munich Agreement.
Afterwards, the March leaders accepted an invitation to the White House to meet with this person and photos were taken.
